content: *simple crochet stitches turn out this terrific looking throw the pretty patterning comes from the variegated yarn used to create the piece lion brand yarn * skill level easy + level 3 homespun® article #790 3 colors 8 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm work pattern in row of color until the piece measures 53 inches crochet 5-round border to finish crochet terms are in u s terminology available in different colorways 40593 crochet new wave throw 1 january 2005 *prairie rococo mediterranean* 70072ad new wave throw 2 september 2007 *russet ranch antique* *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-new-wave-throw-2 l 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-new-wave-throw-1 variant=32420159029341
